title: KYC Certificate Content
description: Certificate content for Know Your Customer (KYC) verification data containing various fields required for identity verification and validation.

surname.description: The surname (last name) of the individual.

forename.description: The forename (first name) of the individual.

middlename.description: The middle name of the individual.

yearOfBirth.description: The year of birth of the individual.

monthOfBirth.description: The month of birth of the individual (1-12).

dayOfBirth.description: The day of birth of the individual (1-31).

citizenship.description: The citizenship of the individual as an ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code.

verificationLevel.description: The level of KYC verification achieved.

streetAndNumber.description: The street name and house number of the individual's address.

postcode.description: The postal code of the individual's address.

town.description: The town or city of the individual's address.

region.description: The region of the individual's address as an ISO 3166-2 code.

country.description: The country of the individual's address as an ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code.
